metadata.synopsis: A birthday dwarf is brought by his friend to Sharess Caress. The idea of celebrating his majority in a bordelo has left said dwarf quite sour, for more than one reason. This is the friend 02's one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to 6; 50; 84- talk to the second human friend

0.speaker: Laila
0.text: Why are some people so strange about Sharess' Caress? It's just sex.

1.speaker: Laila
1.text: Sorry, can't talk - busy dealing with a prude.
